00026 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyRArmour()
00027 {
00028   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00029 
00030       // load the background graphic and add it
00031       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00032       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Armourbackground.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00033       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiArmourBackground));
00034 
00035       // load the gunsgrid graphic and add it
00036       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00037       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Armourgrid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00038       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiArmourGrid));
00039 
00040       InitBobbyBrTitle();
00041 
00042       guiPrevArmourFilterMode = -1;
00043       guiCurrentArmourFilterMode = -1;
00044 
00045       //Draw menu bar
00046       InitBobbyMenuBar( );
00047 
00048       SetFirstLastPagesForNew( IC_ARMOUR, guiCurrentArmourFilterMode );
00049 
00050       RenderBobbyRArmour( );
00051 
00052       return(TRUE);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void ExitBobbyRArmour()
00056 {
00057       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiArmourBackground);
00058       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiArmourGrid);
00059       DeleteBobbyMenuBar();
00060 
00061       DeleteBobbyBrTitle();
00062       DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
00063 
00064       giCurrentSubPage = gusCurWeaponIndex;
00065       guiLastBobbyRayPage = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_ARMOR;
00066 }
